reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great new building and sparkling bathroom. Helpful staff and great KuDamm location. Comofortable bed and openable windows (for once) and good value for money in Berlin too. The things we knew would weren't getting did grate on us finally. No in room phone. No in room wireless (though free wireless available in the VERY swish lobby/bar), tiny TV and no control on aircon/heating. Good Motel One package but we still hoped for a little bit more.
reviews.title: Almost everything that opened and closed

reviews.text: Pros- excellent location in Ku'daam not far from the train station, and the shopping & restaurant district - all within easy walking distance. Very new hotel and therefore clean & modern. Comfy beds. Very affordable/great value for money. Cons- no in-room phone which was frustrating as I couldn't call home to Australia. Free wi-fi only in lobby, but only after you obtained a password from reception which changed every day - frustrating. Also, LCD tv was far too small & looked ridiculous on the room wall.
reviews.title: Excellent value, clean & centrally located in Ku'daam

reviews.text: We were very happy with this motel. It is really near the KaDeWe, there are plenty of restaurants not too far away. The room was a little bit too small but with everything you need. And very clean. Nice staff, not only at the reception desk but also in the breakfast lounge. A good choice of marmalade, real nutella (not a no-name cream!). If you have a room on the street side be aware that it could be a little bit loud but the windows are good and you do not hear anything when they are closed.
reviews.title: A good choice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We decided we would go to Berlin for New Year and was pleasantly surprised that we could get a hotel at a reasonable price that looked quite stylish.
reviews.title: Poor customer service

reviews.text: Stylistically the hotel looks fine and has been dressed very simply. In terms of location, there are a number of nice bars and restaurants within 10 minutes walk and the excellent trains are also easily accessible within 5 minutes. The journey from the airport was approximately 45 minutes from recollection.
reviews.title: Convenient, clean, pleasant and great value for money

reviews.text: We stayed for 3 nights. Arriving by car was easy - parkering house in the same building. Very good place for visiting Kurfürstendam. Easy acces to the S-bahn. Clean rooms - not too big! Fine breakfast. Price reasonable.
reviews.title: Perfect place to stay for a visit in Berlin

reviews.text: I visited Motel One KuDamm in April 2011 with friends. We liked the decoration of the hotel, the rates that are ideal for budget travellers and its close position to public transport.
reviews.title: So and so...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: However there were some disadvantages. There was no heating in the rooms, we had to pay the full amount before even check in! There was no phone in the room and we could not communicate as we were on different floors. I believe there are better options to stay in Berlin.
reviews.title: Great value!

reviews.text: Stayed at Motel One for three days and was pleasently surprised. Fine rooms, excellent cleaning, and a good (and large) breakfast buffet for only 7½ €. Though it is only at two-star hotel is has everything you need and is probably one of the best hotels for such a low price.
reviews.title: Best one in Berlin

reviews.text: I stayed in this hotel everytime I went to Berlin. its my second home out there.
reviews.title: Safe location & good value

reviews.text: This place doesn't offer all the aspects of luxury, but the very important one - the air-conditioner. All the other things are necessities, and the package is most satisfying - there is everything you need for a good night rest and a cheerful start of a new day. The building faces the S-Bahn (city railway) station, but you don't hear a sound from the outside, when in your room.
reviews.title: Perfect. Just perfect, if you don't spend all the day in your room.

reviews.text: The hotel is clean, comfy, conveniently located and not expensive.
reviews.title: Great hotel if you know what to expect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: They serve good breakfast, too.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff is friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Brand new, trendy hotel at an excelent location

reviews.text: I'll definitely return there, when I am in Berlin next time.
reviews.title: small but comfortable

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel for a few days in the depths of winter in February and found it great. The location was brilliant , very close to the Zoo station and the hotel's contemporary design is clean and welcoming.
reviews.title: Fantastic location, great price, rooms are quite small

reviews.text: The only slight problem for me was the size of the rooms which are only slightly larger than the very comfortable bed. There is very little storage space - especially difficult inthe winter when you need space to hang thick coats/jackets and there was nowhere convenient to put my suitcase, which in the end stayed ont he floor and turned the room into something of an obstacle course.
reviews.title: More attention to detail needed

reviews.text: The desk in my room was very small, but just about adeqaute for my computer. There is free wifi in the lobby of hte hotel and pay wifi in the rooms whcih worked well.
reviews.title: EXCELLENET CONTEMPORARY HOTEL

reviews.text: The breakfast buffet was good - a small but adequate selection of cheese, salalmi, ham cereals and yoghurt and very fresh rolls and the price was very reasonable. There is a small bar but no significant food avaiable during the day evening. However there are many restaurants and cafes nearby and there is a large supermarket on the next block.
reviews.title: compact, stylish, but no frills

reviews.text: Overall this is a comfortable budget hotel which I would be happy to recommend.
reviews.title: really great!
